title: Ticket #6067: add a tool that can compare daemon stats and show top results
description:
There should be a tool that can take two daemon ads (generated by using condor_status -direct -statistics ALL:2) and calculate the amount of time and total number of calls to various commands that are tracked by the stats code.

The tool will be called condor_top. Here is the usage 

Usage: condor_top.pl [-nhs num] classad-file1 clasad-file2
    Calculate runtime statistics from two classads and display the top
    results. The two input classads should be from the same daemon at
    different times.
    -n:         Displays only notable items
    -h: Display this usage statement
    -c num:     Sort by column number 'num'

To use this tool, get two classads for the same daemon separated by some amount of time. Ideally the classads will the have verbose statistics you get from condor_status -statistics, for instance: 

condor_status -direct -name <schedd-name> -schedd -statistics -long > first.ad
sleep 60
condor_status -direct -name <schedd-name> -schedd -statistics -long > second.ad
condor_top.pl first.ad second.ad
